data.title: [Solved] To which political party did EMS Namboodiripad belong at the
data.meta_description:
The correct answer is ​CPI(M).

Key Points


	 EMS Namboodiripad belongs to CPI at the time of his becoming the chief minister of Kerela.
data.text:
-> The SSC Selection Post Answer Key has been released. This is the provisional answer key and objections against the same can be submitted online from 2nd to 5th July 2024.

-> The Paper 1 of SSC Selection Post Phase XII 2024 was held on 20th, 21st, 24th, 25th and 26th June 2024.

-> The SSC Selection Post Phase XII Notification has been released for a total of 2049 vacancies.

-> The SSC Selection Post exam is conducted for recruitment to posts of Matriculation, Higher Secondary, and Graduate Levels.

-> The selection process includes a CBT and Document Verification.
